item.biomancy.mob_sinew.tooltip: Fleshy bits made of Elastic Fibers.
item.biomancy.mob_fang.tooltip: Tooth made o' tissue with lots o' earthy bits.
item.biomancy.mob_claw.tooltip: Nail made o' tough fibers with lot o' earthy bits.
item.biomancy.mob_marrow.tooltip: Marrow 'arvested from ta' bones of yer victims. Made with lots o' humors and earthy bits.
item.biomancy.withered_mob_marrow.toolti:
Withered Marrow, some dark seawater be oozin' out o' it.
It be lookin' tasty, maybe ya' should suck it dry...
item.biomancy.mob_gland.tooltip: A sac filled ta' the brim with vitriol.
item.biomancy.toxin_gland.tooltip: A sac full of poison, maybe you should make ta' captain drink it...
item.biomancy.volatile_gland.tooltip:
A sac filled with seawater mixed with cannon-powder.
It don't look like it be deadly... May be worth drinkin' if ye run out of rations.
item.biomancy.flesh_bits.tooltip: A wee scrap o' flesh... Used mostly fer craftin'.
item.biomancy.bone_fragments.tooltip: A few wee fragments o' bone. It be gvin' rigidity and shape ta' flesh. Good fer assemblin' machine parts.
item.biomancy.tough_fibers.tooltip: Natural rope that be very tough and rigid. Useful fer craftin' things that be needin' strength.
item.biomancy.elastic_fibers.tooltip: Natural rope that be sturdy, an' still twisty and stretchy. It be a good material ta' fake muscle.
item.biomancy.mineral_fragment.tooltip:
Craftin' bits only obtained in Muncher.
Used ta' toughen and harden natural ropes.
item.biomancy.gem_fragments.tooltip:
Now yer bedazzlin' yer squidgy monstrosities!
Used ta' enhance hardened natural ropes all the way, but it be very pricey.
item.biomancy.bio_lumens.tooltip:
A basic craftin' bit only found from ta' Muncher, usually with last night's leftovers.

Used ta upgrade things so they be glowin'.
item.biomancy.organic_matter.tooltip: Moist once-livin craftin' bits, made out'ta plants. It be dark and fibrous, lookin' much like what be left in the latrine.
item.biomancy.exotic_dust.tooltip:
Ta' very essence of magic itself.
A rarity, obtained by munchin' magical odds 'n ends.
item.biomancy.stone_powder.tooltip: A very basic craftin' component, looted as a byproduct from munchin' odds 'n ends.
item.biomancy.nutrients.tooltip: Packed wit' energy, it be almost lookin' like green musket shot.
item.biomancy.nutrient_paste.tooltip:
Sustenance mixed wit' Last Night's Leftovers to moisten ta' 'ard pellets, makin' a paste.
It be lookin' like jaundiced cake, and it be an easy source o' grub.
item.biomancy.nutrient_bar.tooltip: Sustenance Slop pressed inta the shape of an ingot. It's bettr'n hard-tack!
item.biomancy.bloomberry.tooltip: A tasy treat which be glowin' on it's own. It be grantin' random boons when eaten.
item.biomancy.regenerative_fluid.tooltip: Seawater infused with healin' power, it be used by witches to concoct remedies.
item.biomancy.withering_ooze.tooltip: A corrosive ooze. It be used by witches fer their evil brewin'.
item.biomancy.hormone_secretion.tooltip: A vial with ta' perfect balance o' ta' four humors. It be good fer' makin'... substances, if ye know what I mean.
item.biomancy.toxin_extract.tooltip: A fluid so deadly ya really shouldn't touch it. Used by witches to make ta' real nasty stuff.
item.biomancy.volatile_fluid.tooltip: Seawater that gets a little too excited. It needs further processin' to be truly deadly.
item.biomancy.bile.tooltip: Base material which is often used by witches ta' make their brews.
item.biomancy.despoil_sickle.tooltip:
A fragile weapon forged fer the sole purpose o' pillaging special loot from yer enemies.

When in either hook, the tool guarantees Fresh loot drops. When it triggers, it be damaged a little extra.
item.biomancy.vial.tooltip:
A small container, it be very resistant to the witches' brews and be perfect for holding 'em.
The vial melts after it be used.
item.biomancy.living_flesh.tooltip:
It be alive!
Except, it be lookin' a little too dull ta' be the brain of somethin'. Ya could turn it inta a construct instead.
item.biomancy.primordial_core.tooltip: An ominous bit o' plunder made o' flesh. Lookin' at it makes you feel like ya' lost yer sea-legs...
item.biomancy.creator_mix.tooltip: Some grub made for ta' cauldron... not fer you.
item.biomancy.injector.tooltip:
A simple tool that be usin' a sharp needle ta' quickly and forcefully inject Serums inta Mobs an' Players.

Can be infused with:
 - Sailin' through: Increasin' ta' chance to get through yer target's armor
 - Numbin' Hands: Preventin' ya from hurtin' the thing ya be injectin'
item.biomancy.fertilizer.tooltip: Fertilizer that causes yer plants ta' grow quickly, even for Sugar reeds, cactus, verruca o' nether and tall one's flower.
item.biomancy.gift_sac.tooltip:
It be lookin' like some loot be wrapped in a layer o' skin. Might be filled with loot if ye be German.

Right Click ta' Sac to retrieve yer loot.
item.biomancy.ravenous_claws.tooltip:
Extremely hungry an' vicious Claws forged by starvin' yer livin' flesh and slappin' claws onto it.

Repair yer famished claws by feedin' them wit' grub in yer inventory, as ya' would fill a Pouch.

Killin' Mobs with these claws be grantin' ya' humors, which allow ya' to use ta' Berserker's Rage.
item.biomancy.extractor.tooltip: Primed Suck, slurps essence from its victims.
item.biomancy.organic_compound.tooltip: Slimy liquid made o' bile infused with sustenance.
item.biomancy.unstable_compound.tooltip: Mighty unstable substance. Seems it'd explode if it be touchin' just about anythin' else.
item.biomancy.exotic_compound.tooltip: It be o' questionable nature, made o' magic essence and other bits n' bobs.
item.biomancy.genetic_compound.tooltip: Mixer o' various humors, nutrients and other livin' bits. It be used fer producin' potent drugs.
item.biomancy.corrosive_additive.tooltip: A fluid that be quickly corrodin' even ta' thickest o' cannon barrels. It be useful for burnin' away livin' material, or weakenin' the hulls of yer rivals' ships.
item.biomancy.healing_additive.tooltip: A mightily concentrated brew that be used to imbue its healin' powers ta other brews.
serum.biomancy.ageing_serum.tooltip: Forces the agin' of young Mobs inta Adults. Some rare Mobs may even turn inta Elders.
serum.biomancy.rejuvenation_serum.toolti: Reverses the agin' of Mobs, most times it be turning 'em inta kiddos.
serum.biomancy.enlargement_serum.tooltip:
It be makin' Cubes o' Slime, Cubes o' Magma and Cubes o' Flesh grow.

(If Pehkui be installed, ya can enlarge yerself and any Mob ya like)
serum.biomancy.shrinking_serum.tooltip:
It be makin' Cubes o' Slime, Cubes o' Magma and Cubes o' Flesh shrink.

(If Pehkui be installed ya can shrink yerself and any Mob ya like)
serum.biomancy.cleansing_serum.tooltip:
Burns away any unusual concoctions inside a creature.
It be very effective on hangovers n' other effects that be refusin' to be healed with cow juice.
serum.biomancy.breeding_stimulant.toolti: It be makin' Animals hyper-fertile, so they can repeatedly breed for a short time.
serum.biomancy.absorption_boost.tooltip: It be grantin' stackable absorption health boons to Mobs and Players.
serum.biomancy.insomnia_cure.tooltip:
It be makin' yer head believe you slept, so ya can stay in ta' crow's nest all night.
Who be needin' coffee?
item.biomancy.hungry_flesh_blob_spawn_eg: Hungry Cube o' Flesh Cackle Fruit
item.biomancy.legacy_flesh_blob_spawn_eg: Legacy Cube o' Flesh Cackle Fruit
item.biomancy.primordial_flesh_blob_spaw: Ol' Magic Cube o' Flesh Cackle Fruit
item.biomancy.primordial_hungry_flesh_bl: Ol' Magic Hungry Cube o' Flesh Cackle Fruit
block.biomancy.primordial_cradle.tooltip: If ye offer adequate loot ta' the cauldron, it will summon forth messengers o' beautiful flesh.
block.biomancy.decomposer.tooltip:
A livin' contraption that munches yer loot into its base bits.
Tha' Muncher consumes sustenance to work.
block.biomancy.digester.tooltip: A contraption born from flesh. It be convertin' grub 'n plants into sustenance.
block.biomancy.tongue.tooltip: Takes up to 3 bits o' loot o' the same type ev'ry 24 ticks from containers it be attached to, and drops 'em on ta' deck.
block.biomancy.maw_hopper.tooltip: A squidgy sister of ta' Suckin' Device. It be shippin' up ta' 16 bits o' loot at once.
block.biomancy.storage_sac.tooltip: Cheap Shulker-like lootcontainer, that also be actin' like a bundle.
block.biomancy.fleshkin_chest.tooltip:
Crafted from livin' flesh, the livin' makeup of the coffer makes it mighty resistant to even cannons, ensurin' the safety of your most precious loot.

Only its captain may unlock its contents without invoking the wrath of its razor-sharp fangs.
block.biomancy.fleshkin_pressure_plate.t:
Fleshsiblin' pancake. It be lookin' tasty...
It be havin' two behaviors, either it only be activatin' fer its captain, or it be only workin' for ta' crew an' landlubbers.

Sneak click to change how it be behavin'.
block.biomancy.flesh.tooltip: A generic block of flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.flesh_slab.tooltip: A generic slab of flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.flesh_stairs.tooltip: Stairs made of generic flesh... Don't bother me with this!
block.biomancy.packed_flesh.tooltip: Tenacious Block of flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.packed_flesh_slab.tooltip: Tenacious Slab of flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.packed_flesh_stairs.toolt: Stairs made of tenacious flesh. Is it tough enough?
block.biomancy.flesh_pillar.tooltip: A Pillar made of bones and flesh.
block.biomancy.fibrous_flesh.tooltip: A unusual block flesh made from the innards of someone.
block.biomancy.chiseled_flesh.tooltip: A regal block of flesh... I'm most delighted
block.biomancy.ornate_flesh.tooltip: A set of regal teeth and flesh.
block.biomancy.ornate_flesh_slab.tooltip: A set of regal teeth and flesh.
block.biomancy.flesh_fence.tooltip: Fence made of bones and flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_fence_gate.tooltip: Fence gate made of bones and flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_iris_door.tooltip: Trapdoor-like iris door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_door.tooltip: A sliding door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.full_flesh_door.tooltip: A wide sliding door made of flesh...
block.biomancy.flesh_spike.tooltip:
A deadly trap fashioned from combinin' reinforced bone and sinew. Be usin' caution when approachin', for any contact will harm ya' mightily.

Many spikes can be placed within a single location, makin' 'em even more lethal.
block.biomancy.flesh_ladder.tooltip: Ladder mainly made of bones and a little bit of flesh...
block.biomancy.bio_lantern_yellow.toolti: A source o' glowin' that be both energy-efficient an' environmentally friendly.
block.biomancy.bio_lantern_blue.tooltip: A source o' glowin'. This one be remindin' me o' ta' sea!
block.biomancy.primordial_bio_lantern.to: A violet source o' light made from a glowin' berry.
block.biomancy.bloomlight.tooltip: A source o' light that's come down with scurvy. This one be violet too!
block.biomancy.impermeable_membrane.tool: Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.
block.biomancy.impermeable_membrane_pane: Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.
block.biomancy.baby_permeable_membrane.t:
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only kiddos can pass through ta' membrane.
block.biomancy.baby_permeable_membrane_p:
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only kiddos can pass through ta' membrane.
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only adults can pass through ta' membrane.
block.biomancy.adult_permeable_membrane_:
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only adults can pass through ta' membrane.
block.biomancy.primal_permeable_membrane:
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only livin' mobs can pass through ta' membrane.

Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only livin' mobs can pass through ta' membrane.
block.biomancy.undead_permeable_membrane:
Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only once-dead now-livin' mobs can pass through ta' membrane.

Membrane that be remindin' me of jellied eels. It be reinforced with stretchy fibers.

Only once-dead now-livin' mobs can pass through ta' membrane.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh.tooltip: Ancient and pure, ye better not touch this with yer dirty hook.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_slab.tooltip: Ancient and pure, ye better not touch this with yer dirty mitts.
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_stairs.toolt:
Stairs made o' primal flesh.
Feels ancient and pure...
block.biomancy.primal_flesh_wall.tooltip:
Wall o' primal flesh. Do this be Terraria?
Ye better start running >:D
block.biomancy.smooth_primal_flesh.toolt: Ancient and pure, ye better not touch this with yer dirty hook.
Ancient and pure, ye better not touch this with yer dirty mitts.
block.biomancy.smooth_primal_flesh_stair:
Stairs made o' primal flesh.
Feels ancient and pure...
Wall o' primal flesh. Do this be Terraria?
Ye better start running >:D
block.biomancy.porous_primal_flesh.toolt: Primitive and pure, you better not touch this with your dirty mitts.
Primitive and pure, you better not touch this with your dirty mitts.
block.biomancy.porous_primal_flesh_stair:
Stairs made of primal flesh.
Feels primitive and pure...
Wall of primal flesh. Is this Terraria?
You better start running >:D
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh.tooltip: It be lookin' dangerous, ye better not touch it!
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_slab.tool: It be lookin' off-puttin', probably best not to be touchin' it.
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_wall.tool:
Wall o' scurvy-ridden flesh.
It's coming for you! ;)
block.biomancy.malignant_flesh_veins.too:
They be lookin' almost feral...
ye better not touch them.
block.biomancy.primal_bloom.tooltip:
A beautiful flower o' ancient beauty.

It be spreadin' itself by launchin' its ripe berry into ta' air.
On impact, ta berry explodes like a powder-keg, and spreads scurvy-ridden veins.
block.biomancy.primal_orifice.tooltip: An ancient hunk o' flesh that be full of holes. It be leakin' somethin' acidic.
entity.biomancy.primordial_hungry_flesh_: Ol' Magic Hungry Cube o' Flesh
enchantment.biomancy.despoil.desc: When killing somethin' with a weapon that has this magic, it will drop more special loot.
enchantment.biomancy.anesthetic.desc: Keeps yer target from noticin' yer Injector stickin' into 'em, and makes sure you don't hurt 'em when ya do it.
death.attack.biomancy.chest_bite: %1$s tried openin' a coffer, but got cursed instead
death.attack.biomancy.spike_fall_on.play: %1$s was thrown into a spike pit by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.spike_fall_on.item: %1$s was skewered by a sharp spike by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.biomancy.spike_impale: %1$s was impaled by a scarrin' spike
death.attack.biomancy.spike_impale.playe: %1$s was impaled onto a scarrin' spike by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.spike_impale.item: %1$s was impaled onto a scarrin' spike by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.biomancy.corrosive_acid: %1$s succumbed to lots o' acid burnin'
death.attack.biomancy.corrosive_acid.pla: %1$s was doused with corrosive acid by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.corrosive_acid.ite: %1$s was showered in corrosive acid by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile.p: [WIP] %1$s was forcefully implanted with teeth by %2$s
death.attack.biomancy.tooth_projectile.i: [WIP] %1$s received a lethal dental implant by %2$s using %3$s
tooltip.biomancy.ability.bleed_proc.desc: When activated, makes yer' target Bleed (max 2)
tooltip.biomancy.ability.blood_explosion: When yer' target is Bleedin', they lose 10% of t'er vitality
tooltip.biomancy.ability.shredding_strik: When hittin' 'em 'ard, shreds any Armor they might be wearin' (max 20)
When hittin' their weakness, covers 'em in grog
sounds.biomancy.bony_flesh_block.step: Step on Squidgy Block o' Bone
sounds.biomancy.bony_flesh_block.fall: Fall on Squidgy Block o' Bone
sounds.biomancy.ui.bio_forge.open: Open Menu of Forge o' Flesh
sounds.biomancy.ui.bio_forge.select_reci: Choose yer Recipe in Forge o' Flesh
sounds.biomancy.ui.bio_forge.take_result: Craft somethin' in Forge o' Flesh
